CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Steel
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.label: steel
CosmereCore.Defs.MetalDef.description: Steel is a durable alloy of iron and carbon, valued for its strength, rigidity, and versatility. Ubiquitous across weaponry, construction, and tools, it forms the foundation of advanced metallurgy.
